channel.title: Comments on: Creating a Semi-additive Measure over a Parent-child Hierarchy
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Alex
item.dc:creator: Alex
item.description: That would be 'more than one parent child hierarchy'
item.content:encoded: That would be ‘more than one parent child hierarchy’

item.title: By: Alex
item.dc:creator: Alex
item.description:
This is an excellent approach. It works great with one parent-child dimension.
However I could not make it work with than one parent child hierarchy in the cube. Do you have any tips for that?
Thanks in advance!
item.content:encoded:
This is an excellent approach. It works great with one parent-child dimension.

However I could not make it work with than one parent child hierarchy in the cube. Do you have any tips for that?

Thanks in advance!

item.title: By: Alexander
item.dc:creator: Alexander
item.description: Thank you very much for article. It's exactly my case! )
item.content:encoded: Thank you very much for article. It’s exactly my case! )
